data.title: Harrisonburg Rockingham Historical Society
data.meta_description: The Harrisonburg-Rockingham Historical Society in Dayton, Rockingham County, Virginia is home to the Heritage Museum, an excellent genealogy library, a gift shop and bookstore, an electric map depiction of General Thomas 'Stonewall' Jackson's 1862 Valley Campaign, temporary and permanent exhibit space with featured exhibits, folk art, and the history of Harrisonburg and Rockingham County. Website designed by HeritageCenter.com
